name: InspirationalAdvice
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: inspirational advice
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Are you looking for inspiration? Do you want advice that can help you understand yourself? Are you craving some ACTIONABLE TIPS rather than just vague poetry?

You have come to the right place. Inspirational Advice shows you concrete steps you can take to achieve a super positive attitude. With the right mindset, you can solve all your problems and move towards an amazing life you love. 


HOW TO USE

Get started by saying: “Alexa, open Inspirational Advice”.

Every time you open, Inspirational Advice will pick a new message for you!


GET IN TOUCH

We’d love to know your thoughts!

Send us your feedback at spirit.tools.voice@gmail.com or leave us a review down here. :)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
